similar_jobs: Software Engineer Jobs in United States
job_description:
The position of SENIOR .NET Developer will build software using languages and technologies of the .NET
framework. This role will create applications from scratch, configure existing systems and provide user
support. Gathering user requirements and developing a solution is a key component of this role. This
role will be responsible for maintaining the current business system and creating new business
indicators in SQL reports. The ability to work as part of a team and individually is a requirement. This
role will offer leadership, and support as well as mentor and collaborate with the .Net Developers.

Responsibilities
Participate in requirements analysis.
Write clean, scalable code using Senior .NET programming languages.
Collaborate with internal teams to produce software design and architecture.
Test and deploy applications and systems.
Revise, update, refactor and debug code.
Improve existing software.
Write clean code to develop functional web applications.
Perform UI tests to optimize performance.
Gather and address technical and design requirements.
Provide training and support to internal teams.
Follow emerging technologies.

Skills or Requirments
An understanding of the entire web development process (design, development, and
deployment)
Experience with programming languages like Senior .NET and databases like SQL Server
Familiarity with front-end languages (e.g., HTML, JavaScript, and CSS)
Excellent analytical and time management skills
Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude
Supervisory skills are an asset
3 to 5 years experience with coding and .Net systems
